definition: angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]

sentences.english: The Pentagon argued that the United States can do whatever it wants in international waters.
sentences.chinese: 五角大樓辯稱美國可以在國際水域做任何事情。

sentences.english: If you attack the Pentagon, you might want to hide.
sentences.chinese: 如果你襲擊了五角大樓，你就別想重見天日。

sentences.english: The Pentagon building burns after American Airlines Flight 77 crashed into it on September 11, 2001.(Reuters/Hyungwon
sentences.chinese: 遭受美國航空77號飛機撞擊後五角大樓正在燃燒。

sentences.english: But the Pentagon higher-ups, he says, changed his mind.
sentences.chinese: 但是據他透露，五角大樓的高層人員改變了他的想法。

sentences.english: There is still no hotline between China's armed forces and the Pentagon in Washington.
sentences.chinese: 而中國軍方和華盛頓五角大樓間仍然沒有這種熱線。

sentences.english: A new Pentagon report says China is already headed in that direction.
sentences.chinese: 五角大樓的一份新報告說中國已經朝這個方向邁進。

sentences.english: In 2006, he became director of operations for the Joint Staff at the Pentagon.
sentences.chinese: 2006年，他擔任了五角大樓聯合參謀部作戰部長。

sentences.english: But politicians on both sides of the congressional aisle have complained about the Pentagon escaping this stringency.
sentences.chinese: 但是國會兩院都抱怨五角大樓受到了特別優待。

sentences.english: It is called ‘a grumbler’ in the US Pentagon.
sentences.chinese: 在美國五角大樓，它被稱爲“牢騷鬼”。

sentences.english: The system is highly advanced. It has been code named Long Tooth by the Pentagon.
sentences.chinese: 整個系統非常先進，五角大樓給它的代號是‘長牙’。

sentences.english: A group of people made a circle around the Pentagon.
sentences.chinese: 一羣人在五角大樓四周圍成一圈。

sentences.english: Another aircraft crashed into The Pentagon in Arlington, Virginia.
sentences.chinese: 另外一架則撞上位於弗吉尼亞州阿林頓的五角大樓。

sentences.english: Two planes have crashed into the World Trade Center and one has hit the Pentagon .
sentences.chinese: 兩架飛機撞入了世貿中心和一個已擊中五角大樓。

sentences.english: Well, admitted Saxe, the Pentagon is already trying to recruit her.
sentences.chinese: 哦，薩克斯承認，五角大樓已經在試圖招募她。

sentences.english: Eisenhower secretly ordered the Pentagon to build ICBMs with "maximum urgency."
sentences.chinese: 艾森豪威爾祕密命令五角大樓集中全力研發洲際導彈。

sentences.english: This includes Pentagon spending of $880 billion.
sentences.chinese: 這包括五角大樓的八千八百億美元開支。

definition: variant of 戰略伙伴|战略伙伴[zhan4 lu:e4 huo3 ban4]
General Douglas MacArthur (1880-1964), US commander in Pacific during WW2, sacked in 1951 by President Truman for exceeding orders during the Korean war
